companies.name: Manulife
companies.info: Manulife is one of the largest insurance companies in Canada, providing a wide range of financial products and services.

companies.name: Great-West Lifeco
companies.info: Great-West Lifeco offers life insurance, health insurance, and retirement products. It operates in multiple countries.

companies.name: Sun Life Financial
companies.info: Sun Life Financial provides life insurance, health insurance, and investment products. It is a global financial services company.

companies.name: Fairfax Financial
companies.info: Fairfax Financial is a Canadian financial holding company engaged in property, casualty insurance, and reinsurance.

companies.name: Intact Financial
companies.info: Intact Financial Corporation is the largest provider of property and casualty insurance in Canada.

companies.name: Industrial Alliance
companies.info: Industrial Alliance offers life and health insurance, savings and retirement plans, mutual and segregated funds, auto and home insurance.

companies.name: Power Corporation
companies.info: Power Corporation of Canada is a diversified international management and holding company with interests in financial services.

companies.name: RBC Insurance
companies.info: RBC Insurance provides a wide range of life, health, home, auto, travel, wealth, and reinsurance products.

companies.name: TD Insurance
companies.info: TD Insurance offers home, auto, life, health, travel, and credit protection insurance products.

companies.name: Desjardins
companies.info: Desjardins Group is the largest cooperative financial group in Canada, offering a wide range of financial products and services.
